item.title: Last Christmas
item.description: [[songs/m/mother_love_bone/apple/gentle_groove.md#ahah-vyl-wnanory|Ah-ah]] [[songs/m/mother_love_bone/apple/gentle_groove.md#ahah-vyl-wnanory|Ooh-ah]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/meteora/breaking_the_habit.md#clutching-my-cure-i-tightly-lock-the-door-vyl-wnanory|Ooo-ah]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/wildlife/harder_harmonies.md#it-falls-to-the-floor-vyl-wnanory|Last Christmas I gave you my heart]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/wildlife/harder_harmonies.md#it-falls-to-the-floor-vyl-wnanory|But the very next day you gave it away]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/wildlife/harder_harmonies.
